text: Xinshimen a! Sharen changming de falu [zhu] yi wei nimen guiding: Ziyou ren dichang ziyou ren, nuli dichang nuli, nuxing dichang nuxing. Dan ruguo beihai zhe de qinshu yuanyi gei xiongshou yixie kuanshu, name, beihai zhe de qinshu ke tichu heli de peichang. Xiongshou ying jiyu kangkai de peichang. Zhe shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de jianxing he ci min. Cihou, shei chaoyue fadu [ru huo peichang hou you shahai xiongshou], shei bi shou tongku de xingfa.
